Transform Info Readme 

To enable or disable Transform Info: 
- [Click Transform Info Menu >> Toggle] or [Right Click a Transform Component >> Toggle Transform Info]

To enable or disable follow handle: 
- [Click Transform Info Menu >> Follow Handle] or [Right Click a Transform Component >> Toggle Follow Handle]

To add or remove decimal points:
- [Click Transform Info Menu >> Add Decimal || Remove Decimal]

To add or decrease the font size:
- [Click Transform Info Menu >> Increase Size || Decrease Size]

Usage:
- Go to the scene view and select an object to see its values

Keyboard Shortcuts:
- B Key = Edit X values
- N Key = Edit Y values
- M Key = Edit Z values
- Comma Key = Cycle through Tool modes
- Period Key = Cycle root children
- Number Keys (0 - 9, ., -) = Add value
- Backspace Key = Erase last value
- Escape Key = Revert translation
- Enter Key = Apply new values

To change the XYZ value edit mode keyboard shortcuts 
- locate the TransformInfo/Assets/Scripts/TransformInfo.cs script and change the default Keycode values at the very top of the script.

To change the text color:
- locate the TransformInfo/Assets/Scripts/TransformInfo.cs script and change the default text color/size values at the very top of the script.

For finer precision and control while incrementing smaller values like  0.01, zoom closer to the object your moving in scene view.
